title: Best Piece Of Trivia You Learned This Week: Psychopath Edition
teaser: True or false — psychopaths are insusceptible to contagious yawning. Ophira Eisenberg and Jonathan Coulton get down to the scary truth.
contentencoded:
True or false — psychopaths are insusceptible to contagious yawning. Ophira Eisenberg and Jonathan Coulton get down to the scary truth.

Heard in They Might Be Wrong, Wrong, Wrong
